name: Project O.R.B. (Calvin Dsouza)
description:
Project O.R.B. is a roguelike bullet hell arcade game developed as part of my third year project in college.

The goal of the player in Project O.R.B. is to survive an onslaught of enemies for as long as possible by dodging enemies, shooting them down, and upgrading their character with the right stat upgrades to improve their ability to survive.

This is only a prototype of what I would like the gameplay would feel like. If you like Project O.R.B. in it's current state, comment below and give me your suggestions and feedback!!

Controls:

  • Keyboard & Mouse
    • WASD - Player Movement
    • Mouse Movement - Aim
    • Left Mouse Button - Fire
    • Esc - Pause Game
  • Gamepad
    • Left Stick - Player Movement
    • Right Stick - Aim
    • Right Trigger - Fire
    • Back - Pause Game
